meanings.definition: In a manner deserving strong condemnation or disapproval.
meanings.sent1: She behaved deplorably by cheating on the test.
meanings.sent2: The team played deplorably and lost the game.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at singing was deplorably off-key.
meanings.sent4: The situation deteriorated deplorably after the argument.
meanings.sent5: The smell in the room was deplorably unpleasant.

meanings.definition: To a very bad or unacceptable degree.
meanings.sent1: The company deplorably neglected safety regulations.
meanings.sent2: The food was deplorably undercooked and inedible.
meanings.sent3: The cat deplorably knocked over the vase.
meanings.sent4: His behavior deplorably mirrored that of a spoiled child.
meanings.sent5: The road conditions were deplorably dangerous during the storm.
